description: Iketani Kouichirou, one of http://anidb.net/ch9199 [Takumi]`s friends, works at a local gas station with both Takumi and http://anidb.net/ch9259 [Itsuki]. Itsuki admires him, as Iketani is leader of the local racing team, the Akina Speed Stars. Iketani drives a Nissan S13 Silvia. At first, Iketani thinks that the Speed Stars are the best drivers in Akina but later his boss Yuuichi tells Iketani of the mysterious driver of an AE86 who was the fastest driver in his time, and that he suspects that the driver is the owner of the local tofu shop.
name: Iketani Kouichirou
